DocumentationDefinitionList.Title: User preferences: Tabs of the preferences dialog
DocumentationDefinitionList.Heading: Tabs of the preferences dialog

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Holds preferences that solely affect the traditional workplace. For content editors this workplace is more and more redundant and thus the settings are not important for most users. Furthermore, they can typically also be set via the preferences dialog of the traditional workplace.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Shows account information and allows users to change their password.
